name: Virtual Dream Center 4.0
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 4.0" features the following virtual exhibitions :

ELISE VANDEWALLE & FUSILLER : “ATBASH”
NATHALIE NOVAIN : “SOLID SPACE FAILED”
GUILLAUME CONSTANTIN : “PANOPTIKUM II”
JEAN-BAPTISTE GELEY : “L’OASIS”

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
